mapper.select: SELECT VC.CREW_CODE AS crewCode , VC.CREW_NAME AS crewName , VC.CREW_OP_DATE AS crewOpenDate , VC.TITLE_ACHV_GET_CODE AS titleAchievementGetCode , VC.TITLE_ACHV_CODE AS titleAchievementCode , VC.TITLE_ACHV_NAME AS titleAchievementName , VC.CREW_COURT_CODE AS crewCourtCode , VC.CREW_FAV_BTL_MODE_CODE AS crewFavoriteBattleModeCode , VC.CREW_FAV_BTL_MODE AS crewFavoriteBattleMode , VC.CREW_BTL_REFUSE_CODE AS crewBattleRefuseCode , VC.CREW_BTL_REFUSE AS crewBattleRefuse , VC.CREW_JOIN_MIN_BIRTHYEAR AS crewJoinMinBirthyear , VC.CREW_JOIN_MAX_BIRTHYEAR AS crewJoinMaxBirthyear , VC.CREW_JOIN_MIN_FPS AS crewJoinMinFairplayScore , VC.CREW_JOIN_ABL_LIMIT_CODE AS crewJoinAbilityLimitCode , VC.CREW_JOIN_MIN_TIER_CODE AS crewJoinMinTierCode , VC.CREW_JOIN_MAX_TIER_CODE AS crewJoinMaxTierCode , VC.CREW_JOIN_MIN_TIER AS crewJoinMinTierGrade , VC.CREW_JOIN_MAX_TIER AS crewJoinMaxTierGrade , VC.CREW_JOIN_MIN_ABL_SCORE AS crewJoinMinAbilityScore , VC.CREW_JOIN_MAX_ABL_SCORE AS crewJoinMaxAbilityScore , VC.LEADER_MEMBER_CODE AS leaderMemberCode , VC.LEADER_ACCT_CODE AS leaderAccountCode , VC.LEADER_NICKNAME AS leaderNickname , VC.CREW_STATUS AS crewStatus , VC.FPS AS crewFairplayScore , VP.CREW_STATUS AS crewPenaltyStatus , VP.PENALTY_COUNT AS penaltyCount , VC.CREW_PROFILE_IMG AS crewProfileImg , VC.BATTLE_COUNT AS battleCount , VC.SCORE AS battleCount , VC.CREW_GRADE AS crewGrade FROM VIEW_CREW VC LEFT JOIN VIEW_CREW_PENALTY_SUMMARY VP ON VC.CREW_CODE = CP.CREW_CODE WHERE VC.CREW_CODE=#{crewCode}
